column2: Western Asset Intermediate Muni Fund Inc

Western Asset Intermediate Muni Fund Inc. (The Fund) is a diversified closed-end management investment company. The Fund’s investment objective is to provide common shareholders a high level of current income exempt from regular federal income taxes consistent with prudent investing. The Fund's investment manager is Legg Mason Partners Fund Advisor, LLC (LMPFA) and Western Asset Management Company, LLC is the Fund’s sub adviser. The Fund invests in securities that provide income exempt from federal income tax. It invests primarily in investment grade municipal securities. The fund employs intensive research to create its portfolio. It benchmarks the performance of its portfolio against the Barclays Capital 1-15 Year Municipal Bond Index.
